Sentencas: The combustion synthesis is a really suitable synthesis route to achieve, at low temperatures, finely, homogeneous, and reactive powders for ceria-based electrolytes.

Sentencas: This work describes the combustion synthesis of binary and ternary compositions of the (CeO2)(0.92)(Ln(2)O(3))(0.04)(CaO)(0.04) systems, being Ln = Y, Gd and Sm.
Titulo: Synthesis of ceria-based electrolyte nanometric powders by urea-combustion technique

Sentencas: The characterisation of the as-prepared combustion products showed that the combustion synthesis provides a straightforward method for the achievement of solid solutions of these materials as nanometric powder.
